nodes.text: The Gatherers were a group of non-Jedi worshipers whose aim was to spread the teachings of the light side of the Force and the Jedi Order during the reign of the First Order. The organization operated a secret lightsaber shop in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu called Savi's Workshop, which was owned by the Gatherer Savi. In the shop, visitors were given a tour where they could construct their own lightsaber, though the operation had to remain hidden from the local First Order occupiers. Thus, the store was disguised as Savi & Son Salvage.

The Gatherers appear to guests in Savi's Workshop, a retail location located in the theme park land Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. The shop, along with the park, opened on May 31, 2019 at Disneyland and August 29, 2019 at Disney's Hollywood Studios, Walt Disney World.
